scripts.compile:all: npm run compile && npm run compile:test && npm run compile:bin
scripts.test:rollup: npx rollup node_modules/lit-html/lit-html.js --file test/modules/lit-html.js --format cjs --banner "var window = {}"
scripts.test: npm run compile:all && npm run set-cypress:all && npm run test:unit && npm run cypress
scripts.examples: npm run compile:all && npm run compile:examples && npm run serve
scripts.website: npm run compile:all && npm run compile:examples && gulp prepareWebsite && gulp bundle --cwd examples
scripts.coverage:instrument: nyc instrument build/es/ instrumented/ && nyc instrument build/cjs/ instrumented-cjs/ && gulp replaceTestImports
scripts.coverage:prep: npm run compile:all && gulp precoverage && npm run coverage:instrument
scripts.coverage:report: gulp filterInstrumented && tsc -p src/tsconfig.sourcemap.json && nyc merge .nyc_output .nyc_output/joined.json && npm run coverage:report:html && npm run coverage:report:lcov && npm run coverage:post
scripts.coverage:post: echo "Coverage can be found in coverage/index.html"
scripts.coverage: npm run coverage:clean && npm run set-cypress:all && npm run coverage:current-cypress-run && npm run coverage:run-unit && npm run coverage:report
scripts.coverage:current-cypress-run: npm run coverage:prep && nyc --no-clean --reporter=text npm run cypress
scripts.coverage:current-cypress: npm run coverage:current-cypress-run && npm run coverage:report
scripts.coverage:classes: npm run set-cypress:classes && npm run coverage:current-cypress && npm run coverage:report
scripts.coverage:lib: npm run set-cypress:lib && npm run coverage:current-cypress && npm run coverage:report
scripts.coverage:partial-classes-basic: npm run set-cypress:partial-class-basic && npm run coverage:current-cypress && npm run coverage:report
scripts.coverage:partial-classes-complex-templat: npm run set-cypress:partial-class-complex-template && npm run coverage:current-cypress && npm run coverage:report
scripts.coverage:partial-classes-i18n: npm run set-cypress:partial-class-i18n && npm run coverage:current-cypress && npm run coverage:report
scripts.coverage:partial-classes-theming: npm run set-cypress:partial-class-theming && npm run coverage:current-cypress && npm run coverage:report
scripts.coverage:properties: npm run set-cypress:properties && npm run coverage:current-cypress
scripts.coverage:tasks: npm run set-cypress:tasks && npm run coverage:current-cypress
scripts.coverage:unit: npm run coverage:clean && npm run coverage:instrument && npm run coverage:run-unit && npm run coverage:report
scripts.coverage:cypress: npm run coverage:clean && npm run set-cypress:all && npm run coverage:current-cypress
